description:
This room is large and cavernous, with pillars extending to the ceiling. Footsteps echo into the darkness. The journey begins to the north... 
There's also an old-man, a little-boy, and a shopkeep in the room.

The cave walls narrow in and create a hallway of sorts. The hallways comes to a split where the west path leads to light while the east path leads to a pile of rocks. To the south is a large room.
The shadowy figure of the shopkeep looms in the corner.
The room is oddly shaped like a perfect cube. The stone walls are completely smooth. On the far wall, there's ladder. To the east is a hallway.
It's bright here at the surface. There seems to only be flat grasses for miles. Only the ladder breaks up the landscape.
This room is large and cavernous, with pillars extending to the ceiling. Footsteps echo into the darkness. The journey begins to the north...
Cave walls narrow in and create a hallway of sorts. The hallways comes to a split where the west path leads to light while the east path leads to a pile of rocks. To the south is a large room.
Here the hallway ends abruptly. The only noticeable landmark is the pile of rocks at your feet
The room is oddly shaped like a perfect cube. The stone walls are completely smooth. On the far wall, there's ladder leading to sunlight. To the east is a hallway.
It's bright here at the surface. There seems to only be flat grasses and hills for miles, and only the ladder and a dirt path leading north break up the landscape.

This seems to be the center of a small village. There's a pop-up shop with a strange shopkeep, as well as and old man and a little boy loitering around. To the east are what look like ruins of a time long since forgotten.

There's not much to see beyond the vine entrenched stone that sprawls in front of you, other than the interruptive stone of the mountain it is on. The occasional goblin can be seen sneaking around. There's a small opening leading into the ruins to the south.
The ruins open up to a large atrium. There's an encampment of goblins and goblin warriors. A hallway leads south.
The hall breaks away and the passage fades to nothing but sky and trees. There's a small cave to the west, and then the remains of the hall deadend, cut off by boulders.
A small white rabbit is hopping around at the cave mouth. A strangely dress man is sitting, seemingly waiting, behind a boulder nearby.
